                     ... RELEASE iNFORMATiON ... 


    Windows 8.1 with Update RUS-ENG x86-x64 -12in1- Activated (AIO)
       contains 6 russian and 6 english versions for 32bit(x86)

         - Windows 8.1 Professional x86 Russian
         - Windows 8.1 Professional x86 English
         - Windows 8.1 Professional x64 Russian
         - Windows 8.1 Professional x64 English
         - Windows 8.1 Professional with WMC x86 Russian
         - Windows 8.1 Professional with WMC x86 English
         - Windows 8.1 Professional with WMC x64 Russian
         - Windows 8.1 Professional with WMC x64 English
         - Windows 8.1 Enterprise x86 Russian
         - Windows 8.1 Enterprise x86 English
         - Windows 8.1 Enterprise x64 Russian
         - Windows 8.1 Enterprise x64 English


                      ... iNSTALL iNFO ...


              1.) Burn and install it. 
              2.) Enjoy.

                          
                                .. WARNiNG ...


If  you are going  to install English version of Windows 8.x, then choose
English  in the "Language to install" window. If you are going to install
Russian  version, then choose Russian language instead. The choice of the
installer  interface  language  at the very beginning will not affect the
installation process.
Do  not  try  to  install 32-bit version with 64-bit installer (UEFI-mode
uses  the  64-bit  installer  only).  It  will lead to the mistake in the
installation process.



Program Version: 6.3.9600.17031.140221-1952
Bit : x86-x64
Official site : Microsoft
By assembling : m0nkrus
Language: Russian / English
Treatment: not required ( the installer is already disinfected )

System requirements :
* Processor: 1 gigahertz ( GHz ) or higher.
* RAM: 1 gigabyte (GB ) for the 32-bit version or 2 GB for 64- bit version.
* Free hard drive space: 16 gigabytes (GB) for the 32-bit version or 20 GB for 64- bit version.
* Graphics card : graphics device Microsoft DirectX 9 or later .
* Additional requirements to use certain features.
* To use the touch capabilities requires a tablet or monitor that supports multitouch .
* To access the Windows Store to download and run applications that require an active internet connection and a screen resolution of at least 1024x768 pixels .
* To bind the application requires a minimum screen resolution of 1366x768.

Description:
I asked for a very long time to release assembly with Windows 8.x avtoaktivatsii by analogy with the builds of Windows 7. But some circumstances (ie, lack of adequate medication , then wait another " final " distribution , my personal problems ) prevented this . Nevertheless, I would cease to respect myself if deceived those who had been waiting for this release , who had hoped for me. And then, finally , he is before you . Please love and favor !

Assembly includes 6 versions 6 and Russian versions Russian version for Windows 8.1 32 -bit (x86) and 64 -bit (x64) kernel :

- Windows 8.1 Professional x86 Russian
- Windows 8.1 Professional x86 English
- Windows 8.1 Professional x64 Russian
- Windows 8.1 Professional x64 English
- Windows 8.1 Professional with WMC x86 Russian
- Windows 8.1 Professional with WMC x86 English
- Windows 8.1 Professional with WMC x64 Russian
- Windows 8.1 Professional with WMC x64 English
- Windows 8.1 Enterprise x86 Russian
- Windows 8.1 Enterprise x86 English
- Windows 8.1 Enterprise x64 Russian
- Windows 8.1 Enterprise x64 English

Some features of the assembly:

- At the heart of the assembly are distributions Windows 8.1, posted on MSDN eighth day of April , 2014.
- At the earliest stage of the installation has pre-load a menu where you can select the bit of the primary shell , that is what the installer is used , x86 or x64. Because of this, you should not worry that the 64- bit version of the OS can not stand up for RAID, and that users of 64-bit operating systems may be without service recovery system. For the most inquisitive : Do not attempt to install the 32 -bit version of the OS with the 64 -bit version - the final stage of deployment installer will throw an error and refuses to continue the installation .
- Idle utility Windows Memory Diagnostic (Memtest), developers of affordable grace preboot menu is replaced by its working analogue distribution of Windows 7.
- With the installation media folder removed  Sources  SXS, in which there were local files for manual install . NET Framework 3.5. But this does not mean that the package will be installed locally impossible. In the folder  Support  Framework_3.5 placed compact and easy -to-use installer . NET Framework 3.5 for Windows 8.1.
- In the System Restore service that runs from the installation media , module is integrated Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (MSDaRT) 8.1, which greatly expands the possibilities of resuscitation system.
- Fixed feature Installer Windows 8.1, when using the assembly file ei.cfg, useful for installation under UEFI-BIOS, it becomes impossible to run the installation from under an already installed system .
- Fixed feature Installer Windows 8.1, when multilingual assembly when you run the installation from under an already installed system , there was no language selection Installer . In this assembly language interface is automatically determined based on what OS is running .
- Since when it is started under an already installed system , the choice of wording installed in Windows 8.1 is carried out only by entering the serial number , right in the installer user interface built tips by serial number , which will help to implement this option.
- With the Enterprise and Professional editions unfenced , because of which during the installation phase was impossible to enter the serial number .
- After installation, you will be able to switch the interface language from English to Russian and back standard means Windows 8.1.
- If during installation you will enter a valid license key the selected edition Windows 8.1 in the appropriate field , then the system will be activated by this switch to an entirely legitimate .
- If during installation you will enter some dummy keys (see FAQ), then the system will be installed without any whatsoever activation. This can be useful if you later want to activate keys for Windows 8 ( for Professional and Enterprise) or Windows Media Center ( for Professional with WMC).
- If during the installation under UEFI-BIOS you will enter the key at all, and when installing under an already installed system , take advantage of the key clues in the installer interface , the system will be activated automatically by the activator from KMSAuto Net 1.2.4 Ratiborus with the installation of automatic reactivation every 25 days.
- If the system is activated automatically by a built- in assembly activator , in the start menu shortcut will be added to the executable file named activator "KMS-activation". With this activator can be activated not only Windows, but Office 2010/2013 VL.
- For technical reasons , the 64- bit edition OS with this assembly can not be updated for Windows 7/8.x. However, if you must install a 64- bit edition of under the existing system , is able to initiate a so-called Custom installation . To do this , you must start the installation not through setup.exe in the root of the installation media , and through setup.exe, which is located in the Sources folder distribution. Autorun installation media when you run out of an existing operating system , select the desired type of launch itself

More about MSDaRT
A set of tools Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (MSDaRT) helps to diagnose and troubleshoot the system arising from the start, as well as other problems.


The kit includes the following tools:

- Registry Editor . Utility Registry Editor ERD provides information about the registry , which can help in recovery .
- Master password changes . To display the local user accounts and change the passwords you can use the wizard to change passwords .
- Crash Analyzer . To identify the causes of system failure and determine which driver caused the failure , you can use the wizard failure analysis .
- Restore files . File recovery utility can be used to search and recover deleted files from the file system NTFS or FAT.
- Disk Commander. To restore a partition or volume , you can use the application Disk Commander.
- Disk Cleanup. To delete the data on the disks and volumes , you can use the Disk Cleanup utility .
- Computer Management. Computer Management utility provides recovery tools for a wide range of administrative tasks .
- Explore. Utility Explorer lets you browse files and folders that are stored on different disks .
- Master -making. Master recommends making the most appropriate tool to remedy the situation , and provides step by step instructions for diagnostics .
- Configure TCP / IP. Utility Configuring TCP / IP helps to display and configure TCP / IP.
- Removing patches. By using the remote fixes can remove a Windows hotfix or service pack, which can not be run .
- System File Checker . System File Checker tool allows you to check and restore corrupted or missing system files .
- Search . Search utility allows you to limit your search by specifying the name, location search , the approximate size of the file or the file modification time .
- Defender . Individual means of checking to determine malware or other unwanted programs and provide warnings of potential danger .
- Remote connection . The possibility of establishing a remote connection service of those . Support for problem solving.

Get more detailed information about the tools included in the package , can be of help file , available in the main window MSDaRT.
